item.prism.baton.tooltip.summary: Used to configure interaction points for _Mechanical Arm_ï¼Œ_Mechanical Pipette_ and _Ejector Depot_
block.prism.prism_interface.tooltip.summ: A _proxy_ block for interfacing with adjacent prism containers
block.prism.prism_interface.tooltip.beha: Allows _direct prism interaction_ with the attached container using buckets or prism containers
block.prism.smart_prism_interface.toolti: An _advanced proxy_ block for prism containers with _filtering capabilities_ that restricts which prisms can pass through
Only allows _specified prisms_ to be inserted or extracted
Functions as a _filtered gateway_ to the attached container, preventing unwanted prism types from passing through
block.prism.centrifugal_pump.tooltip.sum: Transports further and faster than _Mechanical Pumps_, can be encased with _Copper Casing_
block.prism.copper_tap.tooltip.summary: Right-click to switch. Can fill _Basins_, _Cauldrons_ below, or perform spout processing on _Depots_ below
create.prism.mechanical_pipette.points_o: %1$s Fluid Interaction Points were removed because they are now out of range
create.prism.mechanical_pipette.no_targe: It appears this _Mechanical_ _Pipette_ has not been assigned any _targets._ Select basin, drain, prism interface and other blocks by _right-clicking_ them while _holding_ the _Mechanical_ _Pipette_ in your _hand_
create.hint.mechanical_arm_no_targets: It appears this _Mechanical_ _Arm_ has not been assigned any _targets._ Select belts, depots, funnels and other blocks by _right-clicking_ them while _holding_ the _Mechanical_ _Arm_ in your _hand_
create.create.mechanical_arm.points_outs: %1$s selected interaction point(s) removed due to range limitations
create.create.mechanical_arm.summary: Mechanical Arm has %1$s input(s) and %2$s output(s)
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette.text_3: Mechanical Pipettes work much like Mechanical Arms, but as the name suggests, they specialize in interacting with Fluid Containers
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette.text_4: For containers that cannot be interacted with directly, Fluid Interfaces can help to bridge that gap
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette.text_5: Besides regular prism containers, Mechanical Pipettes also support more interesting blocks, perhaps helping you express your creativity
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette.text_6: This is the Pipette's content gauge. It displays the current amount of prism held
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette_filter.h: Filtering Targets of the Mechanical Pipette
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette_filter.t: Sometimes it is desirable to restrict targets of the Pipette by matching a filter
Smart Fluid Interfaces exist for this very purpose
The filter slot of Smart Fluid Interfaces can be applied to Mechanical Pipette
prism.ponder.mechanical_pipette_fill.tex: Besides handling logistics, Mechanical Pipette can also be applied in processing scenarios
When a Depot or Belt is selected as output, the Pipette will watch for ingredients above that can undergo prism filling
The Pipette will search all inputs for the required prism, then perform the filling process
prism.ponder.baton.text_3: Sometimes you may want to add or modify interaction points after a Mechanical Arm has been placed
prism.ponder.baton.text_4: Right-Click it with the Conductor's Baton to enter conducting mode. All interaction points will be continuously highlighted
prism.ponder.baton.text_5: Now you can adjust the Arm's interaction points just as if you were holding the Arm itself
prism.ponder.baton.text_6: Once finished, Right-Click the Arm again to update its interaction point configuration
prism.ponder.baton.text_7: Interaction points of Mechanical Pipette and Ejector Depot can also be modified with the Conductor's Baton
prism.ponder.powder_snow.text_1: Powder Snow is now a prism that can be collected from Cauldrons using pipes or Mechanical Pipettes
prism.ponder.powder_snow.text_2: Powder Snow Buckets can be used to set filters for Powder Snow prism
prism.ponder.powder_snow.text_3: Powder Snow prism can also be created using a Mechanical Mixer
prism.ponder.powder_snow.text_4: Right-click the Basin to obtain Powder Snow Buckets
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_1: Centrifugal Pumps have more powerful transfer rates and longer transfer distances than Mechanical Pumps, but consume more stress
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_2: The pump's pressure travels up to 20 blocks along pipes, regardless of input power
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_3: At the same speed, Centrifugal Pumps transfer prisms twice as fast as Mechanical Pumps
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_4: The pump's transfer direction is not affected by rotation direction
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_5: Instead, the side panel can be used to control the pump's transfer direction
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_6: If using the panel is inconvenient, right-click with the Conductor's Baton for quick switching
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_7: Copper Casing can be used to encase the Centrifugal Pump
prism.ponder.centrifugal_pump.text_8: Encased pumps no longer have a panel; their transfer direction is controlled by rotation direction
prism.ponder.copper_tap.text_1: Copper Taps draw prism from containers behind them and can fill Cauldrons or Basins below
prism.ponder.copper_tap.text_2: Copper Taps can be attached to leaves and infinitely output water from waterlogged leaves
prism.ponder.copper_tap.text_3: Copper Taps can perform spout processing on Depots below
prism.ponder.copper_tap.text_4: Redstone signals can be used to control the tap's on/off state
block.prism.andesite_clear_glass_encased: Andesite Clear Glass Encased Large Cogwheel
block.prism.brass_clear_glass_encased_la: Brass Clear Glass Encased Large Cogwheel
block.prism.train_clear_glass_encased_la: Train Clear Glass Encased Large Cogwheel
